description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) has a requirement for repairs to the high-bay pallet racking storage system located in Building D206, DND Halifax Dockyard. The work under this project consists of furnishing all labour, equipment and material to perform the work. Delivery date is 14 weeks after award of contract. \\\
tags: Equipment installation, repair and maintenance, Guardianship

full_summary:
================

### Title
EB144-240739 D206 Racking Repairs

### Tender Information

*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4245280073
*   **Published Date:** 2023-10-12
*   **Closing Date:** 2023-10-27T14:00:00
*   **Publication Status:** Expiré (Expired)

### Contract Details

*   **Contract Description:** This tender invites contractors to submit repair work for the high-bay pallet racking storage system, located in Building D206, DND Halifax Dockyard. The scope of work includes labor, equipment, and material supply to complete repairs.
*   **Estimated Value:** $100,001 to $500,000
*   **Delivery Date:** 14 weeks from contract award

### Procurement Information

*   **Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information

*   **Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contact Person:** Adam Beaumaster, SPAC/PSPC
*   **Contact Email:** adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Notice URL:** <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17704452?extsite=MTc3MDQ0NTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Document and Attachment Information

*   **Document Added:** None
